name: iTRUST NFT Collection
description: Introducing iTRUST, a captivating collection of 100 unique NFTs that seamlessly blend rarity with artistic brilliance. Within this limited edition series, the first 25 NFTs stand as rare gems, each exuding an unparalleled aura of exclusivity. Embrace the essence of trust and rarity as you explore these digital masterpieces. iTRUST is not just a collection; it's a journey through a curated realm of creativity and scarcity. Each artwork within this collection is a testament to the meticulous craftsmanship and unique vision behind every NFT. Dive into a world where the first 25 NFTs unlock an extraordinary level of rarity, making them prized possessions for collectors and enthusiasts alike. The remaining 75 NFTs, while equally enchanting, echo the ethos of the entire iTRUST collection, ensuring a harmonious blend of distinctiveness and artistic expression. Discover your piece of trust and rarity in the world of blockchain art with iTRUST â€“ where innovation meets scarcity, and creativity intertwines with exclusivity. Don't miss your chance to own a digital masterpiece that transcends the boundaries of conventional art.
